pages.text: $(li)The Present is a block that can hold a stack of any item.$(br)$(li)Presents can be dyed placing this block and the specific Dye in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).
$(li)This block can be used to gift items to other person.
$(li)You can right clicking in a Present to open a GUI where you can choose the person to which it will be addressed and write a small description too.
$(li)Once packet, only the recipient and you will be able to open it.
